page.title: 11Children's Recreation-Talke
page.content: At Talke there are a lot of things to do.There are the top and bottom pitches where there are swings,slides and climbing frames,football and revolving barrels.There also are woods which we can explore and play in.On Mondays there is Cubs for young boys aged 8 to 11 and Guides and Brownies at Hill Top School on Thursdays and Fridays .The karate club is on Tuesdays and Fridays at the Talke Youth Centre.It is from half past seven till half past nine.If you want go swimming you can go to Clough Hall Baths at Kidsgrove.The youth club at St Martin's Church meets on Thursdays and Fridays;Thursdays for the young ones and Fridays for the older ones.There is also Barnett's field where you can play Football, Rugby and Golf.At school we have a Disco .We have to pay forty pence to get in.
